channel.title: PVP drops
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone can tell me how make players drop random items when killed. Like, in RSPVP you'll kill a person and get like 5-7 random items. I was wondering how can you do that, but make it 1 random item, and still make the player drop there items? If anyone can help, thank you :D
